name: Phantom Cookies
description: Phantom Cookies is a sativa-dominant hybrid from Northern California that crosses a flavorful Cherry Pie with the resin-heavy Granddaddy Purple. Green and purple hues weave through the buds beneath a crystalline layer of trichomes, from which sprout Phantom Cookies’ electric orange hairs. Its aroma is an intricate blend of earthiness and roasted nuts, accented by sweeter notes of grape and berry. Next comes this hybrid’s crushing euphoria which shakes the mind awake with creativity and happiness. Increase the dose and the brain and body will be overcome with a relaxing haze that dulls nausea, stress, and pain while sharpening the appetite. Phantom Cookies will be ready to harvest outdoors at the beginning of October, but indoor growers will wait 8 to 9 weeks for buds to finish flowering.
descriptionPlain: Phantom Cookies is a sativa-dominant hybrid from Northern California that crosses a flavorful Cherry Pie with the resin-heavy Granddaddy Purple. Green and purple hues weave through the buds beneath a crystalline layer of trichomes, from which sprout Phantom Cookies’ electric orange hairs. Its aroma is an intricate blend of earthiness and roasted nuts, accented by sweeter notes of grape and berry. Next comes this hybrid’s crushing euphoria which shakes the mind awake with creativity and happiness. Increase the dose and the brain and body will be overcome with a relaxing haze that dulls nausea, stress, and pain while sharpening the appetite. Phantom Cookies will be ready to harvest outdoors at the beginning of October, but indoor growers will wait 8 to 9 weeks for buds to finish flowering.

highlightedReviews.text:
This is by far my favorite strain! I have never before smoked any weed that completely and totally killed all my pain.  Ever. I know a lady who recently had her foot amputated and she had me bringing her this strain saying it was the only thing that helped the pain.  The pain relief only lasts about an hour or so, but it kills all pain better than any opiate I've ever encountered.  

Now as for the high... If I smoke only a little, it gets my creativity flowing and energizes me.   If I smoke a whole blunt, it gives me a complete head and body high often ending in couch lock.   It's not a bad feeling though.  

As far as growing goes, this strain is not for amateurs.  Phantom Cookies takes its time and seems to flower an exceptionally long time.    My flowered 10 weeks before harvest and honestly I could have gone another week.   Pay close attention to the trichomes at the end of flower.    You don't want too many amber colored.   About 30% Amber and the rest a milky color is best.    This strain grows very tall so indoor growers may want to scrog their buds.  

Beautiful strain, it is well worth the wait on the buds and the patience and skill it takes to grow.

Excellent day time strain. Maybe 75% Sativa and 25% indica effects.  As an anxious dude I avoid Sativas, and this hybrid has been the best day time strain for me. No anxiety or shakes, just a bright, relaxing high with a gentle body buzz. Potent stuff, got a good high from less than a bowl with medium tolerance. Has a great, strong fresh lemony flavor. Vapes super smooth, no coughing. All in all highly recommended.

articles.title: New Strains Alert: Berry Bomb, Cream Caramel, Outlaw, Blackberry Rhino, and Phantom Cookies
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
We've added some lovely new indicas, sativas, and hybrids to the Leafly Explorer this week! Already had a chance to try these new varieties? Their strain pages are looking pretty bare and could use your reviews (nudge, nudge)…
Looking for a strain that will really blow you out of the water this weekend? Remember to also check out the High Times Cannabis Cup winning strains from the recent San Francisco competition! 
   1. Berry Bomb
Characteristics of Berry Bomb:

Indica-dominant hybrid
Cross between Blueberry and Bomb #1
Breeder: Bomb Seeds
Sweet blueberry and earthy pine aroma
Delivers sedating, full-body effects
Indoor flowering time of 6 to 8 weeks

   2. Cream Caramel
Characteristics of Cream Caramel:

90% indica strain
Cross between BlueBlack, Maple Leaf Indica, and White Rhino
Breeder: Sweet Seeds
Sweet caramel candy aroma
Brings heavy, relaxing effects that soothe the mind and body
Indoor flowering time of 7 to 8 weeks

   3. Outlaw
Characteristics of Outlaw:

80% sativa strain
Cross between Super Haze and Amnesia
Sweet, earthy, and lemon aroma
Presents an uplifting, clear-headed buzz
May help with glaucoma, inflammation, depression, migraines, and ADD/ADHD
Indoor flowering time of 12 weeks

   4. Blackberry Rhino
Characteristics of Blackberry Rhino:

Mostly indica strain
Cross between Blackberry and White Rhino
Sweet, berry aroma
Has relaxing, happy effects
May help with pain, insomnia, appetite loss, and nausea

   5. Phantom Cookies
Characteristics of Phantom Cookies:

Sativa-dominant hybrid
Cross between Cherry Pie and Granddaddy Purple
Earthy, nutty, grape, and berry aroma
Brings euphoric, creative, and happy effects
May help with nausea, stress, pain, and appetite loss
Indoor flowering time of 8 to 9 weeks indoors
